display: Crankshaft, Engine >> Mechanical (Specifications) >> Crankshaft & Connecting Rod Specifications
title: Crankshaft & Connecting Rod Specifications
content:
CONNECTING ROD JOURNAL:
 Diameter .................... 53.950 - 53.975 mm (2.124 - 2.125 inch)
 Out-of-Round (Max.) .................... 0.013 mm (0.0005 inch)
 Taper (Max.) .................... 0.013 mm (0.0005 inch)

MAIN BEARING DIAMETRICAL:
 Clearance No. 1 - 6 .................... 0.025 - 0.051 mm (0.001 - 0.002 inch)
 Max. Allowable (No.1) .................... 0.076 mm (0.003 inch)

END PLAY:
 Standard .................... 0.051 - 0.178 mm (0.002 - 0.007 inch)
 Max. Allowable .................... 0.254 mm (0.010 inch)

MAIN BEARING JOURNALS:
 Diameter:
    High .................... 76.233 - 76.246 mm (3.0013 - 3.0018 inch)
    Low .................... 76.220 - 76.233 mm (3.0008 - 3.0013 inch)
 Out-of-Round (Max.) .................... 0.013 mm (0.0005 inch)
 Taper (Max.) .................... 0.013 mm (0.0005 inch)
